Line 226: Line 226:
==== Microsoft Windows ====
==== Microsoft Windows ====
â
[[File:Windows Vista Desktop.png|thumb|200px|Windows Vista is the latest Windows operating system]]
 
[[Microsoft Windows]] currently supports NTFS and [[File Allocation Table|FAT]] file systems, along with [[network file system]]s shared from other computers, and the ISO 9660 and UDF filesystems used for [[CD]]s, [[DVD]]s, and other optical discs such as [[Blu-ray]]. Under Windows each file system is usually limited in application to certain media, for example CDs must use ISO 9660 or UDF, and as of [[Windows Vista]], [[NTFS]] is the only file system which the operating system can be installed on. [[Windows Embedded CE 6.0]], Windows Vista Service Pack 1, and [[Windows Server 2008]] support [[ExFAT]], a file system more suitable for [[flash drive]]s.
[[Microsoft Windows]] currently supports NTFS and [[File Allocation Table|FAT]] file systems, along with [[network file system]]s shared from other computers, and the ISO 9660 and UDF filesystems used for [[CD]]s, [[DVD]]s, and other optical discs such as [[Blu-ray]]. Under Windows each file system is usually limited in application to certain media, for example CDs must use ISO 9660 or UDF, and as of [[Windows Vista]], [[NTFS]] is the only file system which the operating system can be installed on. [[Windows Embedded CE 6.0]], Windows Vista Service Pack 1, and [[Windows Server 2008]] support [[ExFAT]], a file system more suitable for [[flash drive]]s.
